channel.title: Anny ideas?
channel.description:
Hi evrey one i quited a few years private servers and i wanna begin with it again i wanna ask you peoples some question.. What would you like like a player on a 508 server? Do you like npc training or commands like ::setlvl (skill nummber)? Do you like shops or commands like ::item ore Skills mixed up with pking or only pking and have only commands to do to get your stuff back and other things and money making to get money you need to have some skills or other again ::item anny sucsestion please command...?
thx annyways idk if this the right section:s srry
srry for this bad english

However the key is first cleaning out your server files and making your server stable; Then adding the content you desire.

item.title: Anny ideas?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:14, topic:353341”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=449666.msg3299341#msg3299341 date=1281189439]

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=449666.msg3299327#msg3299327 date=1281189001]

From what I understood you’re asking what people are looking for in servers so I’ll move it.
[/quote]Loooll

[ul][li]NPC Training[/li]
[li]317[/li]
[li]Intelligent Staff Members[/li]
[li]VPS[/li]
[li]And last but not least, a Owner which can speak English properly.[/li][/ul]

You forgot most of the most important things :P, better playing handling, player updating, npc handling and updating, better ways to handle packets, clean the shit out of the server. A lot needs to be done.
[/quote]he can’t get through mine, he doesn’t need new goals.[/quote]

Before he can make a good server, he needs to create a good base for that server to be able to handle all the features he wants to add.

Read full topic

item.title: Anny ideas?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Lin:

What do you mean what am I trying to say? You talk like an idiot, and the fact that you can’t interpret what I meant just goes to show how stupid you are. By the way, wrong section.

I hope you realize that some people dont use english as their native language, so he may not be as proficient in at as you.

By the way, dont nit pick him for this being in the wrong section if all you see from this topic is to bash on him for his english proficiency.

Ontopic: i prefer a good server with a stable exp rate and economy, “sandbox” servers have no point imo.

Read full topic
